thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Dave B
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Dave B

author: Dave B
title: Dave B
text:
Originally placed an order for a monocular from B&H. When it was received, it was not as I had envisioned. The return process was very easy, and hassle free, which I appreciated. I have just placed an order for compact binoculars, which look like a better option to fill my needs. I had confidence to place this 2nd order with B&H because of how they treated me when I returned the first item.
Dave
